      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Gives the current sub-population size.
        Returns:
        the number of individuals in the population

        Gives specific Individual.
        Parameters:
        index - index of Individual (0 - (size - 1))
        Returns:
        Individual

      • fill

        public void fill(int count)
        Fills the sub-population with random individuals. Individuals already in the population stay there and are counted, also.
        Parameters:
        count - the final population size

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Reorders the sub-population in random fashion.

      • addIndividual

        public void addIndividual(Individual individual)
        Adds an Individual to the SubPopulation.
        Parameters:
        individual - an Individual

      • removeIndividual

        public void removeIndividual(int index)
        Removes an indexed Individual from the SubPopulation.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Individual

      • removeIndividuals

        public void removeIndividuals()
        Clear all individuals of the population.

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sorts the SubPopulation according to fitness in descending order.

      • swap

        public void swap(int a,
        int b)
        Exchanges two Individuals in the Population.
        Parameters:
        a - index of Individual a
        b - index of Individual b
